revision.text:
==Locations==
Kanto - Cerulean City
Johto - Goldenrod City
Hoenn - Mauville City
Sinnoh - Hearthome City
==Shops==
===All===
Shovels(see [[Farm]])
Surprise Mulch
Boost Mulch
Rich Mulch
Amaze Mulch
===Johto===
Squirtbottle - increases chance of mutations in [[Berries]]
===Hoenn===
Sprinklotad - increase chance of [[Berries]] replanting themselves upon death.
==Trades==
Will trade sets of [[Berries]] for battle items, different kinds of Pokeballs, items usually found in the [[Underground]], and [[Protein]].
